mapper.select: select * from actor a inner join film_actro_xref fa on fa.actor_id = a.id inner join film f on f.film_id = fa.film_id where f.film_id = #{filmId}
mapper.insert: insert into film(film_name,film_url, show_time, profile, type, country) values (#{filmName},#{filmUrl}, #{showTime}, #{profile}, #{type}, #{country})
mapper.update: update film set film_name = #{filmName} ,film_url = #{filmUrl}, show_time = #{showTime}, is_hot = #{isHot}, country = #{country}, type = #{type} where film_id = #{filmId}
